div.h3: Stuttgart School District , about 1 month ago
div.p: The Stuttgart School District will be closed beginning Tuesday, March 17 through Thursday, March 19. Those will be AMI days for students in the district. Spring Break will be March 23-27. Students will return to school on March 30 unless the district is instructed otherwise.

div.h3: Stuttgart School District , about 1 month ago
div.p:
Due to the cheer tryout judges being in counties where there have been recent positive cases of COVID-19 virus, cheer-leading practices and tryouts for both SJHS and SHS scheduled for Sunday, March 15th-Thursday, March 19th will be postponed.
Dates and times for tryouts will be shared at a later date.
